markdownRemark.html: Situated in the Bay of Cádiz, just past El Puerto de Santa María. The golf course has small fairways and the greens are protected by sand obstacles. It's proximity to the coast, makes the east wind an obstacle for players too.

frontmatter.title: Real Club de Golf Vista Hermosa
frontmatter.description: Real Club de Golf Vista Hermosa - Situated in the Bay of Cádiz, just past El Puerto de Santa María. The golf course has small fairways and the greens are protected by sand obstacles. It's proximity to the coast, makes the east wind an obstacle for players too.
frontmatter.address: Urb. Vista Hermosa, Casa Grande E-11500 Puerto de Santa María-Cádi, Spain
